post:
Warning Wall of Deals Below Featuring our new SSD Cached KVM servers, and SSD Cached VPS Servers.


Front Range Hosting is a VPS hosting company based in Colorado Springs Colorado
Our VPS Servers are Supermicro Built with Xeon E5 Series Processors
Our VPS Servers utilize LSI CacheCade SSD Acceleration, disk space with the speed of SSD's!
Our network, power, and HVAC is fully redundant, and our servers are hosted in a secure datacenter in Downtown Colorado Springs Colorado



Pricing on 4 plans below are inclusive of the FRH25 code.

Memory Format is as follows:  Dedicated/Burst/vSwap

**REMEMBER! Prices are discounted after you click "Add to Cart"**

**OpenVZ Plans**

128M/256M/128M 5G Disk 250G Xfer 1.50/mo [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=16&promocode=FRH25)

256M/512M/256M 10G Disk 500G Xfer 3.00/mo With Code LEB50  [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=18&promocode=FRH25)

384M/768M/384M 15G Disk 750G Xfer 4.50/mo With Code LEB50 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=34&promocode=FRH25)

512M/1024M/512M 20G Disk 1TB Xfer 6.00/mo With Code LEB50 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=19&promocode=FRH25)


[Larger OpenVZ Plans Available](http://www.frontrangehosting.com/vps.php) All plans are 25% off with FRH25 and you can upgrade anytime and keep your discount!


**KVM Plans** **D Plans Have Increased Disk Space**
LET Only KVM-256 256MB RAM 5GB SSD Cached Disk 500GB Transfer 1.87 with KVM25 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=44&promocode=KVM25)
LET Only KVM-256D 256MB RAM 15GB SSD Cached Disk 256GB Transfer 4.50 with KVM25 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=43&promocode=KVM25)
KVM-384 384MB RAM 7GB SSD Cached Disk 750GB Transfer 2.81 with KVM25 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=41&promocode=KVM25)
KVM-384D 384MB RAM, 22GB SSD Cached Disk 384GB Transfer 6.75 with KVM25 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=45&promocode=KVM25)
KVM-512 512MB RAM, 10GB SSD Cached Disk, 1TB Transfer 3.75 with KVM25 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=39&promocode=KVM25)



We also offer Server Monitoring with checks from 3 US locations keep an eye on your servers with us or anywhere else!
You can see the Server Monitoring Plans at http://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?gid=12
